original_text: The former governors who were before me laid heavy burdens on the people and took from them for their daily ration forty shekels of silver. Even their servants lorded it over the people. But I did not do so, because of the fear of God.
korean_text: 나보다 먼저 있었던 총독들은 백성에게서, 양식과 포도주와 또 은 사십 세겔을 그들에게서 빼앗았고 또한 그들의 종자들도 백성을 압제하였으나 나는 하나님을 경외하므로 이같이 행하지 아니하고

sentences.original_text: The former governors who were before me
laid heavy burdens on the people
and took from them forty shekels of silver
Even their servants lorded it over the people
But I did not do so
because of the fear of God
